  • Recommended Tools

Recommended Tools¶

Web Browser¶

If you are using the OnDemand graphical interface to Discovery, the easiest way to use Discovery, you simply need a compatible web browser. Currently, OnDemand supports Firefox and Chrome.

Client-side Programming Tools¶

If you are a more advanced user of Discovery, you will find the following tools helpful for code development and file editing on Discovery.

Windows¶

  • MobaXterm - Enhanced terminal for Windows with X11 server, tabbed SSH client, network tools and much more.
  • Notepad++ - a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports syntax highlighting in several languages.
    • NppFTP - A Notepad++ plugin that supports editing files on remote machines using SFTP.
